ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:16:29 [Issue ID 4000-530726] urn:comicvine:4000-530726 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 13:43:42. [Issue ID 1572460]
ComicInfo.Summary:
From the pages of Doctor Strange...the Empirikul are waging a war on magic with the goal of wiping the fantastical from the pages of existence. This concerns Deadpool, because some of his best friends are magic. As the Empirikul forces batter the defenses of the Monster Metropolis ruled by his demonic wife, Deadpool wades into battle alongside his most spell-casting-est friends. And you know the old saying "Nothing ever goes wrong in a war." That's a saying, right?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|------------------------------------------|--------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Humberto Ramos & Edgar Delgado | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Ron Lim | 2 | | Var | Variant Cover | Unlisted | 3 | | RE | Fried Pie Exclusive Variant Cover | Reilly Brown | 4 | | RE | Fried Pie Exclusive Variant Sketch Cover | Reilly Brown | 5 |
Note: This issue takes place after Deadpool #11.
ComicInfo.Title: Deadpool: The Last Days of Magic
